name: Math.pow()
content:
This function is useful if you need to raise a base number to a power.

![](https://images.code.org/f5f32e6699ccc92f837a17ef6f82cd3d-mathPow.png)

examples.name: Example 1
Example 2

return_value: A floating-point number that represents the value of `base` taken to the power of `exponent`
tips: - Math.pow() only accepts numbers as parameters.
